primary.$description: Use for primary text, such as sentence case headings, field labels and buttons.

primary-inverted.$description: Use for primary text, such as sentence case headings, field labels and buttons on inverted surfaces.

disabled-on-surface.$description: Use for text in a disabled state but on color surfaces.

secondary.$description: Used for secondary text such as body paragraphs.

tertiary.$description: Use for less important texts such as meta-data, breadcrumbs, input field placeholder and helper text.

disabled.$description: Use for text in a disabled state.

default.$description: Used for highlight titles or words on a text block.

on-surface.$description: Use it when the accent text is over a teal-tinted surface (e.g. the label on a Secondary or Tertiary Button on hover state).

high-contrast.$description: Use it when the accent text needs a higher-contrast against a surface (e.g. the label on a Secondary or Tertiary Button on pressed state).

default.$description: Use for critical text, such as input field error messaging.

high-contrast.$description: Use for critical text on lighter red surfaces.

high-contrast-inverted.$description: Use for critical text on inverted surfaces.

default.$description: Use for informational text on inline content.

high-contrast.$description: Use for informational text on lighter blue surfaces.

high-contrast-inverted.$description: Use for informational text on inverted surfaces.

default.$description: Used for success text on inline content.

high-contrast.$description: Use for success text on lighter surfaces.

high-contrast-inverted.$description: Use for success text on inverted surfaces.

default.$description: Use for warning text on inline content.

high-contrast.$description: Use for warning text on lighter orange surfaces.

high-contrast-inverted.$description: Use for warning text on inverted surfaces.

default.$description: Used for emphasis text on inline content.

high-contrast.$description: Use for emphasis text on lighter purple surfaces.

high-contrast-inverted.$description: Use for emphasis text on inverted surfaces.

default.$description: Used for the fill for Primary Buttons on Default state.

pressed.$description: Used for the fill for Primary Buttons on Pressed state.

disabled.$description: Used for the fill for Primary Buttons on Disabled state.

default.$description: Used for the fill for Secondary Buttons on Default state.

pressed.$description: Used for the fill for Secondary Buttons on Pressed state.

disabled.$description: Used for the fill for Secondary Buttons on Disabled state.

default.$description: Used for the fill for Destructive Buttons on Default state.

hovered.$description: Used for the fill for Destructive Buttons on Hover state.

pressed.$description: Used for the fill for Destructive Buttons on Pressed state.

default.$description: Used for the border of a Secondary Button on Default state.

hovered.$description: Used for the border of a Secondary Button on Hover state.

pressed.$description: Used for the border of a Secondary Button on Pressed state.

disabled.$description: Used for the border of a Secondary Button on Disabled state.

default.$description: Use for default focus ring.

accent.$description: Use for the focus ring of highlighted components.

accent-inverted.$description: Use for the focus ring of highlighted components on inverted surface.

error.$description: Use for the focus ring of error state components.

error-inverted.$description: Use for the focus ring of error state components on inverted surfaces.

active.$description: Used for on the Active handle of a Scrollbar component.

inactive.$description: Used for on the Inactive handle of a Scrollbar component.

default.$description: "Used for the border of an Input

active.$description: "Used for the border of an Input

disabled.$description: "Used for the border of an Input

error.$description: "Used for the border of an Input

strong.$description: "Used for dividers with higher emphasis (e.g. dividers over tinted backgrounds

inverted.$description: Used for inverted dividers on solid backgrounds.

default.$description: Used for accented icons or containers with stroke.

strong.$description: Used for accented icons or containers with stroke that requires higher contrast.

solid.$description: Color border for solid info elements (banners, containers).

subtle.$description: Color border for subtle info elements (banners, containers).

solid.$description: Color border for solid success elements (banners, containers).

subtle.$description: Color border for subtle success elements (banners, containers).

solid.$description: Color border for solid warning elements (banners, containers).

subtle.$description: Color border for subtle warning elements (banners, containers).

solid.$description: Color border for solid error elements (tags, containers).

subtle.$description: Color border for subtle error elements (banners, containers).

default.$description: Used for links on default state.

pressed.$description: Used for links on pressed state.

disabled.$description: Used for links on a disabled state.

primary.$description: "Used for the fill color for elevated elements (menus

secondary.$description: Used for the fill color for elevated elements that needs a subtle contrast against the backgroundâ€¦

default.$description: "Used for the fill color for default interactive items (e.g. Menu items

hovered.$description: Used for the fill color for interactive items on Hover state.

selected.$description: Used for the fill color for interactive items on Selected state.

disabled.$description: Used for the fill color for disabled interactive elements (e.g. a disabled option on a menu).

strongest.$description: Used for the background fill or toast and darker elements.

strong.$description: Used for the background fill for sections that require a solid darker teal background.

solid.$description: Use it as the background fill for components or sections that require the brand teal color.

subtle.$description: Use it as an alternative background fill for sections that require a subtle teal background (e.g full-width promo banners, hero sections, etc).

solid.$description: Used for the main background fill for pages and sections.

subtle.$description: Use it as an alternative background to create contrast with other cards or sections (e.g a Dashboard).

solid.$description: Use it as an alternative background fill for sections that require a solid warm background (e.g full-width promo banners, hero sections, etc).

subtle.$description: Use it as an alternative background fill for sections that require a subtle warm background (e.g full-width promo banners, hero sections, etc).

solid.$description: Color background for solid success elements (tags, containers).

subtle.$description: Color background for subtle success elements (tags, containers).

solid.$description: Color background for solid info elements (tags, containers).

subtle.$description: Color background for subtle info elements (tags, containers).

solid.$description: Color background for solid warning elements (tags, containers).

subtle.$description: Color background for subtle warning elements (tags, containers).

solid.$description: Color background for solid error elements (tags, containers).

subtle.$description: Color background for subtle error elements (tags, containers).

primary.$description: Used for isolated icons with higher hierarchy

secondary.$description: Used for icon buttons on default state.

disabled.$description: Used for icons on a disabled state.

default.$description: Used for highlight icons and icon buttons on hover state.
Used for accompany helper texts in a component's error messages.

high-contrast.$description: Use it to accompany helper texts in a component's error messages that require higher contrast (e.g. a tinted red surface).

high-contrast-inverted.$description: Use it to accompany helper texts in a component's error messages on inverted surface.

default.$description: Used for informational icons.

high-contrast.$description: Use for informational icons on lighter blue surfaces.

high-contrast-inverted.$description: Use for informational icons on inverted surfaces.

default.$description: Used for warning icons.

high-contrast.$description: Use for warning icons on lighter orange surfaces.

high-contrast-inverted.$description: Use for warning icons on lighter orange surfaces.

default.$description: Used for success icons.

high-contrast.$description: Use for success icons on lighter green surfaces.

default.$description: Used for emphasis icons.

high-contrast.$description: Use for emphasis icons on lighter purple surfaces.

secondary.$description: Used for subtle icons on hover states.

disabled.$description: Used for subtle icons when disabled.

dark.$description: This is used for the dim fill overlay on modals and other panels that require the user's full attention.

light.$description: Use for the background blur effect.

graphic.$description: Color fill of graphic elements on selected theme (Illustration).

primary-background.$description: Color fill of graphic elements on selected theme (Illustration).
